summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6003 for the improvement of Meridian Avenue from North 85th Street to North 90th Street; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80602 (as amended by Ordinance No. 80741), and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
